shortDescription.default: Special site columns to your site.

longDescription.default: This package includes columns with special functionalities which you can add to your document library or list. Presently there are 2 columns - GUID which displays library GUID, which you can use in you dynamic JSON, another one is Library, which displays Doc.Library or list internal name. To reference these columns in json, use pattern SPFx<columnName>, i.e SPFxGUID etc. To add these columns to your libray, first install this package, then go to library settings > Add from existing site columns > MSF SPFx group > Add the column. Be aware that these columns are assigned values programitically everytame the library page is refreshed (it might change the modified status of your item or distrubt flows).

features.title: Application Extension - Deployment of custom action
features.description: Deploys a custom action with ClientSideComponentId association
